article: as part of his effort to reduce police commissioner william j. bratton 's public profile , mayor rudolph giuliani criticized the police department public relations office last week for trivializing law enforcement with stunts more fitting for `` nypd blue .
abstract: police commissioner uses publicity to communicate with his officers
